snippet: Advertising executives attending a conference in Manhattan said they were concerned about the effects on the economy of a potential federal budget crisis.
abstract: Advertising column observes top advertising and media executives attending a conference in Manhattan say they are concerned about the effects on the economy of a potential federal budget crisis.
lead_paragraph: Advertising executives attending a conference in Manhattan said they were concerned about the effects on the economy of a potential federal budget crisis.

headline.seo: Stalled Budget Talks Cast Long Shadow
headline.main: Stalled Budget Talks Cast a Long Shadow
headline.print_headline: Stalled Federal Budget Talks Cast a Long Shadow for Executives
